text: Ðis synt þara X hyda landgemæra æt Stoce þat is þonne ærest of ðære hyðe andlang streames æt æscmannes yre & swa forð on midde weardne stream<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð on brunnan.
Swa forð on ðeofford & þannon on haligwylle on healdenes ho.
Of þæm ho on pottaforda on hagene forda brygge.
Of hageneforda brygge on hore wade into merscmylne.
Ðis is ðræ X hyda land Boc ætstoce ðe Ædgar cyning gebocade Gode and Sancte Ædeldrede into Ely on ece yrfe his saule to alysednesse ealswa Ælfdryd hit geærndode his gebedda.
